title: Data Pipeline - Method Chaining
description: Master chaining filter, map, and reduce operations to create data transformation pipelines. Learn functional programming patterns and data flow.

concepts.method_chaining: Calling multiple methods sequentially on the same object or array
concepts.filter: Create new array with elements that pass a condition
concepts.map: Transform array elements using a function
concepts.reduce: Aggregate array values into a single result
concepts.pipeline: Series of operations applied in sequence
concepts.functional_composition: Combining functions to create complex operations

learning_outcomes: Use filter, map, reduce in combination
